alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 08 at 3:54AM CST until November 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches possible, with the potential for locally higher amounts. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Uncertainty remains for the areas that could receive the heaviest snow. This will create large spread in potential impacts, and the storm track could still shift.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Benson; Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County
